Question: Though most famous as an architect, this person was an active dealer in Japanese art, primarily ukiyo-e woodblock prints.
Hints: This person would later engage Mueller to build several of his public and commercial buildings between 1903 and 1923.
The two fell in love, even though this person had been married for almost 20 years.
A lesser known project that never came to fruition was this person's plan for Emerald Bay, Lake Tahoe.
